value.name: Fire Destroys A Pair Of Long Beach Stores: Fire Department
value.description: The Long Beach Fire Department is battling a four-alarm blaze at 255 Park Ave. Other first responders were handling the call, the Long Beach Fire Department posted to its Facebook page. Firefighters were checking neighboring buildings at the strip of stores.

value.name: Queensboro FC Names Sports & Entertainment Executive Adam Schneider As Team President
value.description: NEW YORK, May 3, 2021 /PRNewswire/ -- Queensboro FC today announced the appointment of accomplished sports and entertainment executive Adam Schneider as the club's Team President. Schneider ...

value.name: College sports: MSU baseball sweeps
value.description: MANKATO — Adam Schneider and Nick Altermatt hit home runs, and No. 11 Minnesota State swept Concordia-St. Paul 4-3 and 7-1 in a Northern Sun Intercollegiate Conference baseball doubleheader ...

value.name: Magers gets 500th win as MSU downs Sioux Falls
value.description: A career day for third baseman Adam Schneider, a major milestone for coach Matt Magers and a solid relief outing by pitcher Jack Zigan. The three factors combined to give Minnesota State a 10-6 ...

value.name: College sports: MSU has champs at Relays
value.description: Jon Ludwig pitched a complete game in the opener, allowing three hits with six strikeouts. Petersen went 4 for 4 and scored twice, and Adam Schneider had two hits and two RBIs. Ben Livorsi hit a two-run homer, and Nick Altermatt had a two-run double.

value.name: Bishop, Jares Pitch Augustana Baseball to Sweep Over No. 14 Minnesota State
value.description: Bishop got out of the inning, however, with a swinging strikeout of Adam Schneider. Following the threat, Augustana came to the plate in the top of the fourth and produced the lone run of the game.
